message: I'm being generous in this first round, but I'm sure you can understand why I'm keeping the lion's share. Let's see what you think.
Let's be fair and split the money evenly. This way, we both get a good amount, and we don't have to risk losing everything in the later rounds.
I appreciate your fairness, but I'm still going to need more than half to be satisfied.  I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not willing to give up much more than this.
